sentences.en: A beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of the circus performers who is also a dwarf, but his friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.
sentences.cn: 一位漂亮的吊杠艺术家同意与马戏团的领导也是一位侏儒演员结婚，但是他的朋友发现，她之所以想与之结婚的原因是为了他的财产。

sentences.en: a dwarf conifer
sentences.cn: 矮生针叶树

sentences.en: A dwarf going upstairs getting higher step by step.
sentences.cn: 矮子上楼梯,步步登高.

sentences.en: All true love is a peak which sexuality cannot dwarf.
sentences.cn: 所有真正的爱情是性无法使其相形见绌的顶点.

sentences.en: As a slowly contracting dwarf the star may remain luminous for billions of years.
sentences.cn: 收缩较慢的白矮星仍会发光几十亿年.

sentences.en: Deep pink with faint blue, Rose - shaped; erect flowers , strong branches, dwarf.
sentences.cn: 蔷薇型.深粉色,策有蓝色.花朵直上. 枝条粗壮,株形矮生, 直立, 叶长、尖.

sentences.en: He looked around and spotted Garfield the Dwarf.
sentences.cn: 他四下看了看,认出了矮子加菲尔德.

sentences.en: He looked upwards, and saw that the dwarf was smoking in his hammock.
sentences.cn: 他抬头向上一望, 看到矮子正在吊床里喷云吐雾.

sentences.en: He might have been called the invulnerable dwarf of the fray.
sentences.cn: 可以说，他是混战中的一个无懈可击的侏儒。

sentences.en: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
sentences.cn: 《白雪公主和七个小矮人》

sentences.en: Some of the Violets themselves felt that the ugliness of the little Dwarf was almost ostentatious.
sentences.cn: 其实有一些紫罗兰也觉得小矮人的丑陋大半是他自己故意做出来的.

sentences.en: The cathedral is dwarfed by the surrounding skyscrapers.
sentences.cn: 周围的摩天大楼使得大教堂显得很矮小。

sentences.en: The dwarf put his hand to his great flapped ear, and counterfeited the closest attention.
sentences.cn: 矮子用手张起他那大边的耳朵, 装出密切注意的样子.

sentences.en: The dwarf shrugged his shoulders and shook his head.
sentences.cn: 矮子耸耸肩膀,摇摇头.

sentences.en: The only other known example of such an oddly angled orbit was Pluto, until its demotion to dwarf planet status.
sentences.cn: 唯一的另一个已知的以如此奇怪的角度运行的例子是冥王星，直到它降级为矮行星。

sentences.en: There is a dwarf apple tree in our garden.
sentences.cn: 在我们的花园里有一棵矮苹果树.

sentences.en: There the dwarf lay, snapping his fingers with gestures of defiance and contempt.
sentences.cn: 矮子依旧躺在那里, 鄙夷地不屑地弹动他的手指头发出响声.

sentences.en: Vinmar silently looked away as the dwarf paused to collect himself.
sentences.cn: 梵玛静静的把脸转向一边,让矮人不受打扰的收拾自己的情绪.

sentences.en: While he was yet in unspeakable agonies, the dwarf renewed their conversation.
sentences.cn: 他还没来得及摆脱这种难言的痛苦时, 矮子便又恢复了他们的谈话.

sentences.en: Who's the little dwarf yoU got throwing knives at me and my partner?
sentences.cn: 里面那个矮子向我搭档扔飞刀的是谁?

sentences.en: Yes, I am ready. What is the price? asked the dwarf.
sentences.cn: 他问:“是的, 我准备好了. 代价是什么 呢 ?”

phrases.tran_cn: 红矮星（表面温度较低且亮度较弱的恒星）

trans.tran_en: a dwarf plant or animal is much smaller than the usual size

trans.tran_cn: 矮子，侏儒，（童话）小矮人，〈天〉矮星
trans.tran_en: a person who is a dwarf has not continued to grow to the normal height because of a medical condition. Many people think that this use is offensive.
to be so big that other things are made to seem very small

trans.tran_cn: 使显得矮小， 使相形见绌； 阻碍…的生长
trans.tran_en: to be so big that other things are made to seem very small
